headline: Exelon (EXC) Margins Rise Above Expectations, Reinforcing Bullish Outlook on Profit Quality
summary: Exelon (EXC) posted earnings growth of 16.1% over the past year, outpacing its five-year average growth of 11.6% per year. With net profit margins rising from 10.6% to 11.6% and high-quality earnings flagged, investors are likely taking note of the company’s continued operational improvements, especially with earnings projected to increase at 6.5% per year and revenue forecast to grow at 2.6% annually. Trading at a price-to-earnings ratio of 16.6x, which is attractive compared to industry and...
